html.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_PROMPT_LEGAL:
Total Due Now does not include taxes, which will be added after you enter a shipping address. In Massachusetts and Nevada, sales tax will be computed on the higher of the device price or VZW's cost for the device. In California, when a device is purchased at a 2 Year Contract price, sales tax will be computed on the full retail price of the device. Also during the credit check process, a deposit may be added to the total amount due. Pre-Orders will be charged to your credit card when items are shipped.

Verizon Wireless makes every reasonable effort to ensure the accuracy of the information found in this web site. Unfortunately, on occasion typographical errors, inaccuracies, and omissions may occur. In the event that a listed price is incorrect, due to a typographical error, inaccuracy, or omission, Verizon Wireless reserves the right to refuse or cancel the order you placed, even if the order has already been confirmed and your credit card has been charged. If your credit card has been charged, Verizon Wireless will refund your credit card for the charged amount. We apologize for the inconvenience this may cause you.

***Pre-Orders/Back Orders will ship when item becomes available. We reserve the right to limit quantities.
html.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_PROMPT_PLAN_BENEFITS:
• Your data is yours to keep.
  • No more surprise overages.
  • Make calls to and from Mexico and Canada.

label.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_PROMPT_SWITCH_TITLE: Switch to the new Verizon Plan.
label.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_PROMPT_BENEFITS_TITL: The best network just got better
label.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_PROMPT_RES_HEADER: Imagine your new device on better data plan.
label.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_PROMPT_HEADER: Keep your plan or select a new plan.
label.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_DESC: Your new device is only as good as the network it's on.
label.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_MONTHLY_ACCOUNT_ACCE: Account Access is the monthly charge for the service allowances (e.g. minutes, messages, data) included in your plan.
label.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_MONTHLY_LINE_ACCESS_: Line Access, which varies by device type, is the monthly charge for each device that is permitted to use the service allowances included in your plan.
label.DT_OD_CPC_INTERCEPT_TOTAL_MONTHLY_COST: Total Monthly Access Cost for All Devices
label.DT_OD_CPC_SINGLE_PLAN_LINE_TITLE: A simple low-cost plan for just one device.
label.DT_OD_CPC_SINGLE_PLAN_LINE_DESC: Plan includes 1GB data and unlimited talk & text on eligible device.
label.DT_OD_CPC_SINGLE_PLAN_LINE_LONG_DESC: Plan includes 1GB data and unlimited talk & text on eligible devices. Need more data? No problem! Additional data can be charged at $10 for each additional GB used.
label.DT_OD_CPC_SINGLE_PLAN_LINE_LEGAL: Extra data avialble at $10 per GB
label.DT_OD_CPC_SHARE_PLAN_LINE_TITLE: Flexible plan for one or more devices.
label.DT_OD_CPC_SHARE_PLAN_LINE_DESC: Choose from 2GB - 100GB data with unlimited talk and text on eligible devices.
label.DT_OD_CPC_AUTOPAY: Save $5/mo, when you sign up for paperless billing and autopay
label.DT_OD_PLAN_AUTOPAY_TOOLTIP: Auto Pay (sign up online or on the phone using bank acct or debit card) & paper free billing required to get discount. Discount applies monthly as long as paper-free billing and Auto Pay remains active.
label.DT_OD_CPC_SINGLE_PLAN_DESC: devices. Need more data? No Problem! Additional data can be charged at $10 for each additional GB used.
